00033   protected:
00034

00049 
00050 inline void BDSPlanckEngine::SetTemperature(G4double aTemperature)
00051 {
00052  itsTemperature=aTemperature;
00053  kT=k_Boltzmann* itsTemperature;
00054 }
00055 
00056 inline G4double BDSPlanckEngine::PlanckSpectrum(G4double x)
00057 { return x*x/(exp(x)-1);}
